reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Foster is an amazing professor! She explains complex topics clearly and is always willing to help outside of class. Highly recommend her courses.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Mitchell knows his stuff, but his lectures can be dry. You need to put in a lot of effort to keep up, but he's fair in grading.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Reynolds is very knowledgeable and engaging. Her lectures are well-organized, but she gives a lot of reading assignments.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is very difficult to follow in lectures. He goes through material too fast, and the exams are extremely tough.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Patel is fantastic! She makes difficult concepts easy to understand and truly cares about her students' success.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Brown is interesting, but his grading can be harsh. Make sure to participate in discussions, as it heavily impacts your grade.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson is very passionate about biology and makes lectures engaging. Labs are a bit intense, but they help reinforce the material.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Chen is knowledgeable, but his lectures are monotonous. It's hard to stay awake in class, and the exams are tricky.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Davis is wonderful! She encourages deep thinking and discussion. Her feedback on essays is thorough and constructive.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is a great lecturer with real-world experience. His exams are challenging but fair. Stay updated on current events for his class.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Prof. Hernandez is very supportive and creates a welcoming classroom environment. Her classes are discussion-based, which I enjoyed.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Miller is knowledgeable but can be unapproachable. The material is interesting, but the exams are very difficult.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Prof. Evans has a deep passion for art and it shows in her lectures. However, the workload is heavy, so be prepared.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Carter's lectures are confusing, and he rarely answers questions clearly. The textbook is essential if you want to pass.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Prof. Kim is an excellent instructor. Her classes are interactive, and she really cares about the environment and her students.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Wright is interesting, but his lectures can be all over the place. His grading is fair, but you'll need to stay organized.

reviews.subject: Communication
reviews.review: Prof. Lewis is very engaging and makes class enjoyable. The group projects can be a bit challenging, but they're manageable.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Green's classes are tough. He expects a lot from students and doesnâ€™t offer much help. Be ready to struggle.

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez is incredibly passionate about music. Her classes are inspiring, and she offers great feedback on performances.

reviews.subject: Law
reviews.review: Dr. Allen is strict and demands a lot of reading. If you're serious about law, you'll learn a lot, but it's not an easy ride.
